text: Stephanie Morgenstern (born December 10, 1965) is a Canadian actress, filmmaker, and screenwriter for television and film. She has worked on stage, film, and television in both English and French. Her most widely seen roles have been The Sweet Hereafter, Maelstr√∂m, Julie and Me and Forbidden Love. ==Voice cast== Morgenstern is also known by anime fans as the voice of Sailor Venus in the DIC Entertainment English dub of Sailor Moon in the first few seasons as well as the movies. She also voiced the role of Regina of Dino Crisis 1 en Dino Crisis 2 of the famous franchise of Capcom. ==Other websites== * *Official Website Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian television directors Category:Canadian television writers Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian movie directors Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:1965 births Category:York University alumni
title: Stephanie Morgenstern
